thread.title: Suspects wanted in Property Damage case
thread.title_full: Suspects wanted in Property Damage case - FOX 14 TV Joplin and Pittsburg News Weather Sports |

author: cbs8
title: Suspects wanted in Property Damage case
text:
Montgomery County, KS - The Montgomery County Sheriff is asking for your help in locating the individual(s) responsible for an estimated $30,000 in damage to property belonging to a company in Montgomery County. On the 10th day of October between the hours of 10 PM and 12 AM the individual(s) used a truck (possibly a Dodge half ton extended cab red or burgundy in color) to connect to a fiber optic wire. The wire was snagged and the driver continued to try and pull it causing extensive damage to the wire. The wire had been pulled from 3575 to 3700 on CR 3600.
Montgomery County Sheriff Robert Dierks is offering a cash reward for information leading to the arrest of the individual(s) involved. Persons with information can contact the Montgomery County Sheriff's Office at (620)-330-1000 w/ info.
# # #
